name: No field spares kit.
description: Customers are requesting we provide a field spares kit with most-commonly used repair items for convenience of repair technicians.

name: Difficult assembly procedure
description: Manufacturing staff report PCA is difficult to assemble and test due to copper-side-up orientation. Suggestion is to orient PCA component-side up providing for full access to components for more effective visual inspection and easier troubleshooting after assembly.

name: Incorrect PCB layout
description: Connectivity of PCB-type inductor is incorrect.
